sense.name: a share
sense.commentary: The share or a piece of something, set aside for a particular purpose. Treated as an abstract entity.
sense.examples: Each family in need will receive their allocation of welfare funds. I stashed my daily allocation of lunch money inside my locker.

sense.name: distribution of shares
sense.commentary: ALLOCATION[+event] The act of distributing a piece or share of something.
sense.examples: The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives is determined by the population of each state. Within a few minutes, I had finished the allocation of resources among the Trustees.

sense.name: computer disk space
sense.commentary: ALLOCATION[+event] In computer science, the assignment of disk space to data or instructions.
sense.examples: Maybe the program will run faster if we increase its relative disk allocation.
